functions.tag: {CustomModelData:3,display:{Name:'{"translate":"きのこの破片","color":"yellow","bold":true,"italic":false}',Lore:['[{"text":"❖ ","color":"","italic":false},{"translate":"%1$s%2$s(I)","color":"white","with":[{"translate":"練餌の"},{"translate":"刻印"}]}]','{"translate":"膨大なきのこパワーが宿っている。","color":"dark_green","bold":true,"italic":false}','{"translate":"しかし、これでもまだ破片に過ぎない……","color":"dark_green","bold":true,"italic":false}']},Engraving:{EnchantID:"練餌",Tier:1},AttributeModifiers:[{AttributeName:"generic.max_health",Name:"カスタム",Amount:4,Operation:0,UUID:[I;12,0,0,10],Slot:"offhand"},{AttributeName:"generic.attack_damage",Name:"カスタム",Amount:3,Operation:1,UUID:[I;12,0,0,41],Slot:"offhand"},{AttributeName:"generic.attack_damage",Name:"デフォルト",Amount:10,Operation:0,UUID:[I;11,0,1,40],Slot:"mainhand"},{AttributeName:"generic.attack_speed",Name:"デフォルト",Amount:1.6,Operation:0,UUID:[I;11,0,1,50],Slot:"mainhand"}]}
